abstract: ` gma ' deals and steals on last-minute holiday gifts .
article: holiday season is here and if you still have people on your shopping list , tory johnson has exclusive `` deals and steals '' for `` gma '' viewers on must-have gifts . score big savings on everything from jewelry to blankets , all-natural cocktails and more . the deals start at $ 10 and are all at least 50 percent off . you can now find all of tory 's `` deals and steals '' on our special deals website , gmadeals . com . deal details : 1 . use the links provided below on the date listed to receive the savings .

2 . all deals are available only while supplies last . no back orders unless specified by the individual vendor . no rain checks . 3 . deals can not be combined with other coupons and offers . 4 . contact retailers for any questions about products before ordering online . 5 . shipping rates indicated are valid in the continental u. s. only . need help ? contact tory : if you need assistance with a deal , please email tory johnson directly : help@gmadeals . com . tory and her team respond to all viewer emails within an hour during business hours .

by visiting these websites , you will leave goodmorningamerica . com . the shopify powered web stores you are about to link to are operated under different terms and privacy policies than goodmorningamerica . com . abc may receive promotional and financial consideration . alex and ani : bangles , wraps & necklacesoriginal : $ 28 to $ 98gma deal : $ 14 to $ 49 + free shipping50 % savingsvalid : 12/14/17alex and ani proudly designs and crafts its jewelry in america and each piece is made with love from eco-conscious , recycled materials . this large collection of bangles , wraps and necklaces is ideal for gifting -- including for yourself .

every piece has meaning and includes a keepsake meaning card . there are over 40 options . free shipping ! mission : activewear & accessoriesoriginal : $ 25 to $ 150gma deal : $ 10 to $ 6060 % savingsgo from workout to hang out with this line of on-trend , comfortable activewear . combining fitness and fashion , mission 's assortment of apparel features vaporactive technology , which attracts and rapidly removes sweat so you dry faster , stay cooler and go longer . options for men and women , including tees , jackets , hoodies , leggings , shorts and joggers .

heating accessories also available . shipping is $ 4.99 or free for orders over $ 75 . blankie tails : shark & mermaid tail blanketsoriginal : $ 30 to $ 35gma deal : $ 15 to $ 17 + free shipping50 % -51 % savingsget cozy and curl up with super comfy shark and mermaid style blankets . blankie tails ' fun blankets are machine washable and feature an extra-plush , double-sided minky fabric that has enough room to put your feet all the way into the tail to keep you warm . select from a variety of colors for kids and teens/adults .

free shipping ! poo ~ pourri : toilet & shoe spritz setsoriginal : $ 50gma deal : $ 2452 % savingspoo ~ pourri says spritz the bowl before you go and no one will ever know . these fresh-smelling sprays eliminate bathroom odor before it begins by creating a barrier on the surface of the water . this all-natural spray will keep the whole family happy - all you 'll smell is a bouquet of essential oils . shoe ~ pourri sets are also available , which eliminate shoe odor with essential oils and natural enzymes . shipping is $ 5.95 or free for orders over $ 48 .

omaha steaks : assorted meat packagesoriginal : $ 110 to $ 237gma deal : $ 40 to $ 99 + free shipping58 % -64 % savingsa tasty holiday gift for yourself or a loved one - and an ideal way to encourage home-cooked meals . omaha steaks has been bringing families together around the dinner table since 1917 . there are 3 packages , with options that include kielbasa sausages , jumbo franks , top sirloins , all-beef meatballs , ground beef sliders , king cut pork chops and t-bone steaks . free shipping ! be mixed : single serve or party size variety packsoriginal : $ 33gma deal : $ 16.50 eachenjoy your favorite cocktails without the guilt with be mixed - a zero-calorie , zero-sugar and all-natural cocktail mixer .

making a delicious drink is simple , just mix be mixed with your preferred alcohol for a healthy holiday cocktail or be mixed and club soda for a refreshing mocktail . variety packs include three flavors : margarita , cucumber mint and ginger lime . choose from single serve or party size shipping is $ 4.95 . you can now find all of tory 's `` deals and steals '' every thursday on our special `` deals '' website , gmadeals . com .
